course_description: An introduction to fundamental and quantitative issues in clinical research and clinical trial design co-taught by a biostatistician and a clinician. Traditional and non-traditional study designs including aspects of experimental design and analysis are covered in this course. SMajor topics in clinical trial design including good clinical practice and challenges and successes associated with clinical trials conducted at Emory are highlighted. Students participate in class sessions with oral presentations on the advantages and disadvantages of a selected innovative clinical trial design.
